text:
- Actor notetag:
   + spawn change slot type: [panel_id]
     eg  spawn change slot type: 2 # Change to Ice Panel
   + spawn destroy slot random: [team]
     eg: spawn destroy slot random: enemies
         spawn destroy slot random: allies
 - Enemy notetag:
   + <unit spawn change slot type: [panel_id]>
     eg:  <unit spawn change slot type: 2> # Change to Ice Panel
   + <unit spawn destroy slot random: [team]>
     eg: <unit spawn destroy slot random: enemies>
         <unit spawn destroy slot random: allies>
 - Script call: 
   1. destroy_random_slot(team) : Destroy a random unopcupied slot from either team.
      ex: destroy_random_slot(:allies)
          destroy_random_slot(:enemies)
   2. fix_random_slot(team) : Fix a random "destroyed" slot from either team.
      ex: fix_random_slot(:allies)
          fix_random_slot(:enemies)
title: 2/23/18 Updates
